6a24764f-94b0-452f-94c3-b8e62e4d6730.description: The earner of this badge can identify the types of documents required by each element in the application; create and/or modify internal policies and procedures that are compliant with the ANSI/IACET 2018 Standard and required as evidence in the application; create a plan to ensure Standard compliance throughout their organization; describe and practice the steps needed for sound instructional design; articulate the rationale behind the requirements of the 2018 Standard.
6a24764f-94b0-452f-94c3-b8e62e4d6730.name: Introduction to IACET Accreditation Workshop (1 Day)

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard requires a systems approach to continuing education and that each of the Standard categories be controlled within the adherent's management structure as an integral part of operating a continuing education and training department or program.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge can identify the documents required by each element in the (re)application; create and/or modify internal policies and procedures that are compliant with the ANSI/IACET 2018 Standard and required as evidence in the (re)application; create a plan to ensure Standard compliance throughout their organization; describe and practice the steps needed for sound instructional design and delivery; articulate the rationale behind the requirements of the 2018 Standard.

80e6b599-d5d1-490a-85cd-9e6c4cafadb2.description: The earner of this badge can differentiate between initial accreditation and reaccreditation; identify the essential elements of re-accreditation, including required documentation and evidence; discuss how to ensure that annual reports help inform planning and application efforts for reaccreditation; discuss the aspects of the reaccreditation application; and develop a plan for reaccreditation.
80e6b599-d5d1-490a-85cd-9e6c4cafadb2.name: Reaccreditation Readiness Workshop

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard requires a systems approach to continuing education and that each of the Standard categories be controlled within the adherent's management structure as an integral part of operating a continuing education and training department or program.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a minimum of 90% of the course while completing workshop activities and actively engaging in discussions. Activities include comparing differences between initial and reaccreditation, identifying requirements for reaccreditation and Annual Reporting, and developing plans for their organizations' reaccreditation renewal.

1daf6631-5fca-4ab8-af8f-6c06b3be5873.description: The earner of this badge can differentiate between policies, processes, instructions, SOPs, and evidence for the ANSI/IACET 1-2018 Standard; develop and document policies and processes that reflect their CE/T functions; create a plan to gather evidence that supports their documented policies and procedures; and create a plan for communicating CE/T documentation throughout the organization (as well as third parties and clients) to ensure consistency and compliance.
1daf6631-5fca-4ab8-af8f-6c06b3be5873.name: Documentation, Evidence, and Annual Reporting Workshop

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 1-2018 Continuing Education and Training Standard
alignments.description: The ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard requires a systems approach to continuing education and that each of the Standard categories be controlled within the adherent's management structure as an integral part of operating a continuing education and training department or program.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 90% of the time and actively complete the workshop activities and exercises with an activated webcam/microphone. Required activities include: creating policies and processes for an organization's continuing education and training program and working in small breakout groups to complete tasks.

e5bd20f5-72c0-4dcc-9230-edb58f085441.description: This course is an engaging and powerful two-day seminar that discusses current and traditional adult learning theories and practical instructional design & delivery strategies and techniques. The earner of this badge can explain how principles of adult learning can be embedded within instructional design; differentiate between 'assessment' and 'evaluation'; develop methods to evaluate the effectiveness of learning events; create an action plan to put new concepts into practice.
e5bd20f5-72c0-4dcc-9230-edb58f085441.name: A Practical Approach to Training Adults Seminar

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard requires a systems approach to continuing education and that each of the Standard categories be controlled within the adherent's management structure as an integral part of operating a continuing education and training department or program.

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must attend the entire course, actively participant, and satisfactorily complete the assigned tasks/exercises with camera on for at least 90% of the time.

285d8555-009d-4e84-acb8-86461a4cd39a.description: The earner of this badge can identify and create the documents required by each element in the (re)application; create and/or modify internal policies and procedures that are compliant with the ANSI/IACET 2018 Standard and required as evidence in the (re)application; create a plan to ensure Standard compliance throughout their organization; describe and practice the steps needed for sound instructional design and delivery; articulate the rationale behind the requirements of the 2018 Standard.
285d8555-009d-4e84-acb8-86461a4cd39a.name: Introduction to IACET Accreditation Workshop (2 Day)

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard requires a systems approach to continuing education and that each of the Standard categories be controlled within the adherent's management structure as an integral part of operating a continuing education and training department or program.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge can identify and create the documents required by each element in the (re)application; create and/or modify internal policies and procedures that are compliant with the ANSI/IACET 2018 Standard and required as evidence in the (re)application; create a plan to ensure Standard compliance throughout their organization; describe and practice the steps needed for sound instructional design and delivery; articulate the rationale behind the requirements of the 2018 Standard.
